2.title: Power of Words

episode of.title: TED Talks India Nayi Soch (TV Series 2017–2018)

2.plot: In the second episode of TED Talks India Nayi Soch, the 'Power of Words' is the underlying theme and has speakers including wordsmith Javed Akhtar, life skills educator Deepak Ramola, child and adolescent psychologist Shelja Sen, college student and social media campaigner Gurmehar Kaur (daughter of Kashmir martyr Captain Mandeep Singh) and founder-CEO, Uniphore, Umesh Sachdev. It also has a performance by singer and music producer, Clinton Cerejo.

3.title: Badalte Rishte

episode of.title: TED Talks India Nayi Soch (TV Series 2017–2018)

3.plot: This episode of TED Talks India Nayi Soch talks about 'Changing Relationships or Badalte Rishte' - talks about our relationships with each other, the society, with machines, with the world and most importantly, with ourselves. Disruptive artist Jasmeen Patheja, artist and photographer Samar Singh Jodha, filmmaker Karan Johar, innovator-social entrepreneur Trisha Prabhu and environmental activist-writer Bittu Sahgal are the speakers. Musician Sivamani will wrap the episode with an electrifying performance.

4.title: Dekho Aanewala Kal at TED Talks

episode of.title: TED Talks India Nayi Soch (TV Series 2017–2018)

4.plot: One always lives with the hope of a, and for a better 'Tomorrow' - and that is the theme for this episode. CEO, Google Inc. Sundar Pichai, designer and inventor Anab Jain, Senior Manager, AI Science for Alexa, Ashwin Ram, Co-founder of SocialCops, Data Intelligence Company, Prukalpa Sankar, Sciences and Aerospace Engineer and Deputy Director, Mars Orbiter Mission, Ritu Karidhal are the speakers today who will share their hopes for a tomorrow that is better than today. Also, young piano star Lydian Nadhaswaram and singer Shalmali Kholgade perform a piece composed by ...

6.title: Wonder of Learning

episode of.title: TED Talks India Nayi Soch (TV Series 2017–2018)

6.plot: In this episode, we have an engaging mix of speakers sharing their thoughts on the wonders of learning. Neuroscientist Dr Shubha Tole; astrophysicist Dr Karan Jani; founder and CEO of Blippar Ambarish Mitra; cyber security expert Jagdish Mahapatra, and education scientist Sugata Mitra are the eminent personalities talking today. There's also a brilliant performance by Indian folk singer and musician Prahlad Tipanya.

7.title: Pursuit of Happiness

episode of.title: TED Talks India Nayi Soch (TV Series 2017–2018)

7.plot: In this episode, we have an interesting mix of speakers sharing their ingenious ideas on what happiness really means today. Personalities like Dr. Raj Raghunathan, an award-winning professor, renowned Chef Vikas Khanna, software engineer Supriya Joshi, and anthropologist Sarover Zaidi share their thoughts with the audience today. Danish Husain, a storyteller charms the audience with his hilarious storytelling skills.

8.title: Aap Ki Pasand

episode of.title: TED Talks India Nayi Soch (TV Series 2017–2018)

8.plot: In the eighth episode of TED Talks India Nayi Soch, SRK brings to you an encore of all the audience' favourite speakers and their talks. From Javed Akhtar's Power of Words, to Jasmine Patheja's Blank Noise, take a look at the personalities who made an impact with their inspirational talks.

imdb.title: TED Talks India Nayi Soch
plot: The host interacts with inspiring people and discusses issues that are relevant in today's world, from the future of technology to women empowerment.
